casebody.data:
JOHN STUART, Plaintiff and Appellant, v. ELBERT STANNARD et al., Defendants and Respondents.

Before Monell, Curtis, and Sedgwick, JJ.

Decided June 29, 1872. Appeal from a judgment in favor of defendants in an action to recover commissions for the sale of a steamship "belonging to defendants. John H. White, for appellant. A. R. Dyett, for respondents. Judgment affirmed.

Opinion by Curtis, J., Monell and Sedgwick, JJ., concurring.
